Way.Com India Pvt Ltd is looking for a meticulous and quality-focused Content QA Specialist to join our content team. In this role, you’ll serve as the final gatekeeper, ensuring every piece of content meets the highest standards for accuracy, compliance, SEO optimization, and credibility before publication. As a Content QA Specialist, you will perform comprehensive manual reviews to detect low-value or AI-generated content, ensuring alignment with SEO best practices and Google’s EEAT principles.

Key Responsibilities

Content Integrity Reviews

  • Conduct detailed manual reviews of articles, blogs, and landing pages for grammar, clarity, tone, and adherence to brand voice and style guidelines.
  • Identify and resolve issues related to awkward phrasing, factual errors, and inconsistent formatting.

SEO & Content Quality Assessment

  • Ensure proper implementation of on-page SEO elements such as meta tags, headings, internal linking, and keyword usage.
  • Detect and flag content that lacks depth, relevance, or meaningful value to users.

AI-Generated & Plagiarism Detection

  • Leverage manual review and automated tools to identify AI-generated or machine-written content.
  • Run plagiarism checks to confirm originality and maintain the integrity of all published materials.

EEAT Compliance Verification

  • Validate author credentials and evaluate the trustworthiness of cited sources.
  • Ensure content demonstrates subject-matter expertise, proper attribution, and, where relevant, expert contributions.

Quality Assurance & Continuous Improvement

  • Maintain and regularly update the QA checklist to reflect evolving industry standards and content quality benchmarks.
  • Provide clear, actionable feedback to writers and editors to foster ongoing improvements in content production.

  • Minimum of 2 years of experience in content quality assurance, editing, or SEO
  • Exceptional manual editing skills with strong attention to detail
  • Solid understanding of SEO fundamentals and Google’s content quality guidelines
  • Proven ability to identify AI-generated content and assess it for human readability
  • Proficient in using tools such as Grammarly, Copyscape, Copyleaks, Originality.ai, or similar alternatives
  • Skilled at identifying low-value or thin content and providing actionable improvement recommendations
  • Comfortable operating in a high-volume, fast-paced content production environment

  • Educational or professional background in journalism, digital marketing, or technical writing
  • Experience working with content management systems like WordPress
  • Familiarity with structured data, Yoast SEO plugin, and content scoring tools
